title: A guide of silver
body:
How to play in silver (using my "teams" as examples)
1. Give enemy team Baron
2. Give enemy team Rift Herald
3. Never Contest
4. Give enemy free kills
5. Never help the support ward
6. If you die, blame the team despite you being over extended
7. Flame
8. Cry
9. Abuse

Hope this helps all ya'll get outta yo elohell.

replies.body:
I suggest you take a break from League. Seems as though you're on tilt. Play a different game for a while. It's never a good idea to play League (if you want to climb without a level head). Even if it's for an hour or two, it's better then playing while tilted. 

If someone is toxic just mute and report them. It's not worth getting all worked up over. Focus on what you can do better. It helps.
